tool_description: Analyzes and compares costs across suppliers, identifies savings opportunities, and tracks price trends for procurement optimization.

items_to_analyze.description: List of items to analyze for cost comparison

analysis_type.description: Type of cost analysis: price_comparison, trend_analysis, or savings_opportunity

time_period_days.description: Historical period for trend analysis (30-365 days)

error_messages: Invalid analysis type: analysis_type must be one of 'price_comparison', 'trend_analysis', or 'savings_opportunity'.
Invalid time period: time_period_days must be between 30 and 365 days.
Insufficient pricing data: Not enough historical price data available for meaningful trend analysis.
Items not found: Some items in items_to_analyze are not in the pricing database.
usage: Specify items to analyze and choose analysis type. For trend analysis, optionally set the historical time period. The tool provides comprehensive cost insights for procurement decisions.

current_prices.description: Current market prices for each item

price_changes.description: Price change percentages over the analysis period

savings_potential.description: Estimated monthly savings from recommended changes
